Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 55th/Princeton
ShortDescription: Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Halsted, 51st, Wentworth, and 55th, due to flooding near 55th/Princeton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via 55th, Halsted, 51st, Wentworth, and 55th, due to flooding near 55th/Princeton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/75th
ShortDescription: #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 74th, Loomis, 76th, and Ashland, due to  street blockage near Ashland/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 74th, Loomis, 76th, and Ashland, due to  street blockage near Ashland/75th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Red Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier injured rider at 79th. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier injured rider at 79th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
